app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at www.mdpi.com/1660-4601/13/9/889/s1, Table S1: Example web search strings used for locating national health adaptation initiatives, Table S2: Inclusion and exclusion criteria for health adaptation documents, Table S3: Adaptation planning documents or government webpages included, Table S4: Public health adaptation initiatives reviewed by adaptation type or sub-category of adaptation type, Table S5: Departments, agencies or other bodies involved in planning or implementing health adaptation initiatives reviewed, Table S6: Background information on included countriesâ€™ adaptation planning and health system.
